name: Last Division - Survival War
description:
Protect the homeland or become a walking dead, it's time to make a choice. Last Division-Survival War, the latest 2021 FREE strategy game. An unknown vaccine has caused a new dispute in human civilization. When injected, people may be critical mentally impaired, tyrannical, and remain infectious. But there is still the brave one willing to take risks, once this medicine is successfully combined with human cells, it will bring infinite superpowers. Can you unite your friends and bring humanity back together once again to normal? Build your town, train the military, work with other survivors and slay the waves of zombies. Occupy hundreds of cities, rebuild human civilization and write a new legend.

-Features-
Epic War
The extremely fast operation experience like the MOBA game makes battle more intense and enrich your combat strategy. In this real and dangerous world, you can be the lone ranger or build a powerful alliance to hunt the trillions of zombies, against players from all over the world, win the spoils and enjoy your victories as a war commander! There are more than 4 million grids are free to explore on the world map, face and defeat many kinds of unknown enemies to get all kinds of valuable rewards which can help you develop the city to win the highest glory!

Social Community
Align and form strategic partnerships with your friends to survive the horrors of the infected wilderness. Fight for glory, win the servers war. You are not alone in this cruel doomsday world. Take the lead as the supreme ruler, you can build a strong alliance or make allies and forge strategic partnerships, your alliance will always be backing you up. No language barrier! Talk to anyone you want by our real-time translation AI for 999 different languages.

Build City
Build and strengthen your buildings, Trade at any time in the city for the materials and weapons you need more! Get weapons that exceed your expectations with the unique synthesis system. A city that can be attacked and defended is your best protection in this fallen world. Gather materials, research weapons, train troops, make your city all-powerful to help you better survive in the zombie-rule world.

Strategic Gameplay
Smoother than similar games, allowing your troops to execute orders without stuttering for a better gaming experience. Economy, materials, armies, heroes, weapons and armaments, multi-dimensional needs. How can we best use our limited resources to defeat zombies and enemies? Prove to players around the servers that you are the best strategic commander!

Combined Operations
16 Categories of troops, choose what you like and create your strongest army. High freedom to customize your flags, you are invincible! Become an unrivaled leader and be admired by thousands!

PLEASE NOTE: Last Division-Survival War is completely free to download and play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please enable password protection for purchases in your App Store app. A network connection is also required.

Frequent in-game events will keep you busy in your well-deserved leisure time. Come and experience this highly addictive MMO SLG game FOR FREE NOW.
